summary: Air traffic controllers guide more than 80,000 flights to their destinations daily. But as air traffic has increased, the air traffic controller workforce has shrunk. Not having enough controllers can delay or cancel flights and could impact safety. Ensuring enough controllers are available is difficult. The process for hiring and training them is long and complex and many applicants don't make it to the end...
title: Air Traffic Control Workforce: FAA Should Establish Goals and Better Assess Its Hiring Processes
